member.name: P:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Dictionary.WordDictionary.PossibleBaseWords

member.remarks: These are not actual words.

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.CalculateWords
member.summary: Calculates the words from the Text property

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.CheckString(System.String)
member.summary: Determines if the string should be spell checked

param.name: characters
param.para: The Characters to check

member.returns: Returns true if the string should be spell checked

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.MarkHtml
member.summary: Calculates the position of html tags in the Text property

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.Reset
member.summary: Resets the public properties

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.BadChar(System.Collections.ArrayList@)
member.summary: swap out each char one by one and try all the tryme chars in its place to see if that makes a good word

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.ExtraChar(System.Collections.ArrayList@)
member.summary: try omitting one char of word at a time

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.ForgotChar(System.Collections.ArrayList@)
member.summary: try inserting a tryme character before every letter

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.ReplaceChars(System.Collections.ArrayList@)
member.summary: suggestions for a typical fault of spelling, that differs with more, than 1 letter from the right form.

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.SwapChar(System.Collections.ArrayList@)
member.summary: try swapping adjacent chars one by one

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.TwoWords(System.Collections.ArrayList@)
member.summary: split the string into two pieces after every char if both pieces are good words make them a suggestion

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.DeleteWord
member.summary: Deletes the CurrentWord from the Text Property
member.remarks: Note, calling ReplaceWord with the ReplacementWord property set to an empty string has the same behavior as DeleteWord.

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.EditDistance(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calculates the minimum number of change, inserts or deletes required to change firstWord into secondWord

param.name: source
param.para: The first word to calculate

param.name: target
param.para: The second word to calculate

param.name: positionPriority
param.para: set to true if the first and last char should have priority

member.returns: The number of edits to make firstWord equal secondWord

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.EditDistance(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Calculates the minimum number of change, inserts or deletes required to change firstWord into secondWord

param.name: source
param.para: The first word to calculate

param.name: target
param.para: The second word to calculate

member.returns: The number of edits to make firstWord equal secondWord
member.remarks: This method automatically gives priority to matching the first and last char

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.GetWordIndexFromTextIndex(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the word index from the text index. Use this method to find a word based on the text position.

param.name: textIndex
param.para: The index to search for

member.returns: The word index that the text index falls on

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.IgnoreAllWord
member.summary: Ignores all instances of the CurrentWord in the Text Property

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.IgnoreWord
member.summary: Ignores the instances of the CurrentWord in the Text Property
member.remarks: Must call SpellCheck after call this method to resume spell checking

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.ReplaceAllWord
member.summary: Replaces all instances of the CurrentWord in the Text Property

member.summary: Replaces all instances of the CurrentWord in the Text Property

param.name: replacementWord
param.para: The word to replace the CurrentWord with

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.ReplaceWord
member.summary: Replaces the instances of the CurrentWord in the Text Property

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.ReplaceWord(System.String)
member.summary: Replaces the instances of the CurrentWord in the Text Property

param.name: replacementWord
param.para: The word to replace the CurrentWord with

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.SpellCheck
member.summary: Spell checks the words in the property starting at the position.
member.returns: Returns true if there is a word found in the text that is not in the dictionaries

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.SpellCheck(System.Int32)
member.summary: Spell checks the words in the property starting at the position. This overload takes in the WordIndex to start checking from.

param.name: startWordIndex
param.para: The index of the word to start checking from.

member.returns: Returns true if there is a word found in the text that is not in the dictionaries

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.SpellCheck(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Spell checks a range of words in the property starting at the position and ending at endWordIndex.

param.name: startWordIndex
param.para: The index of the word to start checking from.

param.name: endWordIndex
param.para: The index of the word to end checking with.

member.returns: Returns true if there is a word found in the text that is not in the dictionaries

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.SpellCheck(System.String)
member.summary: Spell checks the words in the property starting at the position. This overload takes in the text to spell check

param.name: text
param.para: The text to spell check

member.returns: Returns true if there is a word found in the text that is not in the dictionaries

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.SpellCheck(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Spell checks the words in the property starting at the position. This overload takes in the text to check and the WordIndex to start checking from.

param.name: text
param.para: The text to spell check

param.name: startWordIndex
param.para: The index of the word to start checking from

member.returns: Returns true if there is a word found in the text that is not in the dictionaries

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.Suggest(System.String)
member.summary: Populates the property with word suggestions for the word

param.name: word
param.para: The word to generate suggestions on

member.remarks: This method sets the property to the word. Then calls on the word to generate the need information for suggestions. Note that the Text, CurrentWord and WordIndex properties are set when calling this method.

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.Suggest
member.summary: Populates the property with word suggestions for the
member.remarks: must have been called before calling this method

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.TestWord(System.String)
member.summary: Checks to see if the word is in the dictionary

param.name: word
param.para: The word to check

member.returns: Returns true if word is found in dictionary

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.

member.name: E:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.DeletedWord
member.summary: This event is fired when a word is deleted
member.remarks: Use this event to update the parent text

member.name: E:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.DoubledWord
member.summary: This event is fired when word is detected two times in a row

member.name: E:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.EndOfText
member.summary: This event is fired when the spell checker reaches the end of the text in the Text property

member.name: E:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.IgnoredWord
member.summary: This event is fired when a word is skipped

member.name: E:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.MisspelledWord
member.summary: This event is fired when the spell checker finds a word that is not in the dictionaries

member.name: E:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.ReplacedWord
member.summary: This event is fired when a word is replace
member.remarks: Use this event to update the parent text

member.name: P:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.AlertComplete
member.summary: Display the 'Spell Check Complete' alert.

member.name: P:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.CurrentWord
member.summary: The current word being spell checked from the text property

member.name: P:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.Dictionary
member.summary: The WordDictionary object to use when spell checking

member.name: P:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.IgnoreAllCapsWords
member.summary: Ignore words with all capital letters when spell checking

member.name: P:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.IgnoreHtml
member.summary: Ignore html tags when spell checking

member.name: P:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.IgnoreList
member.summary: List of words to automatically ignore
member.remarks: When is clicked, the is added to this list

member.summary: Ignore words with digits when spell checking

member.summary: Combines the phonetic and near miss strategies

member.name: F:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.SuggestionEnum.Phonetic
member.summary: The phonetic strategy generates suggestions by word sound

member.name: F:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Spelling.SuggestionEnum.NearMiss
member.summary: The near miss strategy generates suggestion by replacing, removing, adding chars to make words
member.remarks: This technique was developed by the open source spell checker ISpell

member.summary: removes all elements from the AffixRuleCollection.

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Dictionary.Affix.AffixRuleCollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)
member.summary: copies the elements of the AffixRuleCollection to an Array, starting at a particular Array index.

param.name: array
param.para: The one-dimensional Array that is the destination of the elements copied from AffixRuleCollection. The Array must have zero-based indexing.

param.name: index
param.para: The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.

member.summary: Determines whether the AffixRuleCollection contains a specific value.

param.name: value
param.para: The value to locate in the AffixRuleCollection. The value can be a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

param.para: the text form of the conditions

param.name: entry
param.para: The AffixEntry to add the condition array to

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Dictionary.Affix.AffixUtility.RemovePrefix(System.String,NetSpell.SpellChecker.Dictionary.Affix.AffixEntry)
member.summary: Removes the affix prefix rule entry for the word if valid

param.name: word
param.para: The word to be modified

param.name: entry
param.para: The affix rule entry to use

member.returns: The word after affix removed. Will be the same word if affix could not be removed.
member.remarks: This method does not verify that the returned word is a valid word, only that the affix can be removed

member.name: M:NetSpell.SpellChecker.Dictionary.Affix.AffixUtility.RemoveSuffix(System.String,NetSpell.SpellChecker.Dictionary.Affix.AffixEntry)
member.summary: Removes the affix suffix rule entry for the word if valid

param.name: word
param.para: The word to be modified

param.name: entry
param.para: The affix rule entry to use

member.returns: The word after affix removed. Will be the same word if affix could not be removed.
member.remarks: This method does not verify that the returned word is a valid word, only that the affix can be removed
